body.name: Projector With WiFi6 And Bluetooth 5.3,XIDU 1200 ANSI FHD 1080P Outdoor Movie Projector Support 4K,Home Theater Bluetooth Projector,Compatible with HDMI/USB/Laptop/iOS/Android/TV Stick/DVD
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 52 mins
features: 【Native 1080P & 1200 ANSI High Brightness 】With 1200 ANSI,20000:1 high contrast, and 16:9/4:3 aspect ratio, XIDU Native 1080P Full HD Projector provides sharp and detailed images image for indoor and outdoor entertainment. It also supports 4K, which brings you crystal clear image.

【WiFi 6 & Bidirectional Bluetooth 5.3】This Outdoor 4K Projector features 5G and 2.4G dual-band WiFi 6. The ultra-fast 5G WiFi provides a smoother and lag-free online video streaming and extreme frame rates for gaming experience. For even more immersive viewing, pair your bluetooth projector with a wireless or wired HiFi soundbar or headphones.

【4D/4P Keystone Correction & 300“ Large Screen】XIDU Video Bluetooth Projector supports electronic keystone correction (4D+4P) digital ±50°. No need to worry about image distortion due to placement. It can be adjusted from 25%-100% via remote control and has a maximum 300'' projection screen for an immersive viewing experience.

【HiFi Speakers & Compatible Devices】This Outdoor Movie projector has built-in 2*10W HiFi stereo surround speakers to provide 360° surround sound, which increases the dynamics and sound field of the sound effect, making the listening experience full and precise yet delicate. It can be easily connected to TV sticks, PC, laptops, Android/iOS phone, PS5, Switch and other devices.

【3 Years Warranty and Dustproof Optical Engine】XIDU Upgraded 5G WiFi Projector is equipped with a fully sealed optical engine, which effectively blocks dust and reduces black spots and light leakage. The LED energy-saving light source has a long lifespan of up to 100,000 hours. XIDU offers a 3-year warranty, 24/7 customer online service, and free replacement parts. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XIDU 2024 Upgraded WiFi6 & 5.3 Bluetooth Outdoor & Indoor Movie Projector！ XIDU 5G WiFi Bluetooth Movie Projector has a resolution of 1080P(4K Support), a brightness of 1200 ANSI, an improved contrast of 20000:1, and a large 300-inch screen. It can be easily connected via WIFI and Bluetooth as well as wired. Watching a movie is like being there!

XIDU PhilBeam S1 Pro Projector's dual connection feature makes it easy to mirror the screen whenever and wherever you are XIDU S1 projector has a convenient 2.4G/5G dual wireless WiFi mirroring function and wired connection mirroring function. Screen mirroring is possible whenever and wherever you are. Wireless Connection S1 outdoor movie projectors has dual-channel (5G+2.4G) WIFI connection to enjoy a fast and smooth transmission experience with no latency wireless connection, compatible with Android/IOS/Windows. Connect to the projector anytime, anywhere and enjoy the simple freedom of wireless! Achieve a truly free and comfortable home theater viewing experience. Wired Connection S1 outdoor projector also supports wired connectivity for IOS and Android devices! Screen mirroring is possible without WIFI, so you don't need to worry even if there is no network around, and you can enjoy a cinema-like visual feast anytime, anywhere through a wired connection.

10-Layer Coated Lens Upgraded 3rd-Gen Optical Glass Lens Enables Color Enhancement to Bring More Vivid Images Rich Color Gamut Up to 98% NTSC To achieve sharper, brighter and richer colors, XIDU S1 native1080P projector features the latest 3rd generation upgraded native 1080p optical glass lens that provides a richer color gamut of up to 98% NTSC, enabling more vivid color reproduction, improved resistance to ambient light and excellent performance in both day and night. Dual 10W HiFi Speakers BLOCKBUSTER SOUND It's like being there. Sound bandwidth, distortion is small, good linearity, dynamic range, and distribution is relatively uniform, the middle and low frequency band energy is more prominent, the proportion of reverberation sound is appropriate, in listening to the sound on the wide range of sound, fullness and comfort. Smart Eye Protection Mode Effectively reduces blue light damage by 90%. This projector has been debugged through thousands of color filters in order to better help children and adults protect their eyes during movie watching, before achieving the current anti-blue light eye protection effect. Your eyes will not feel tired even after 4 hours of continuous movie watching.

XIDU S1 Bluetooth projector provides you more choices with Two-way Bluetooth function 1.You can connect the projector to a smartphone/ tablet as an independent speaker to enjoy surround stereo high-quality sound. 2. It's compatible with different Bluetooth speaker devices. You can connect the projector to other Bluetooth devices, such as Bluetooth headsets, Bluetooth speakers, and other external Bluetooth devices. It provides you an immersive audio visual feast anytime and anywhere.
Adjustable Distance And Size Adjustable projection from 40 to 300 inches. You can enjoy a powerful image space in your living room or bedroom. ZOOM 25%-100% 4D+4P KEYSTONE CORRECTION
